name: Hashi Infinite
description:
Hashi Infinite offers unlimited enjoyment of the classic Japanese logic puzzle also known as "Hashiwokakero" or "Bridges".

Features:
-A puzzle generator that provides new never-before-seen puzzles on demand, from size 5x5 to 20x20, in one of three difficulty levels
-Autodetection of errors and puzzle completion
-Unlimited undo
-Easy-to-use puzzle solving interface
-No ads, microtransactions, social media integration, or points system, nothing but unlimited hashi puzzles to solve
